 Working With Data 
 
 
 
 
 Data Services 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Library Data Services
                                 
 
 
 
 We are happy to provide you with 
 
 best practices for managing data; 
 data management plan assistance; 
 and services for data sharing and preservation. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Using This Guide
                                 
 
 
 
 This guide  
 
 
 gives an overview of Data Management Plans 
 
 
 provides summary information and links to select publisher and funder data requirements 
 
 
 provides resources to deposit or publish research data 
 
 
 links to tools to work with, analyze, and visualize data 
 
 
 provides UC Riverside Library contact information for assistance with data
